name: Temple Generations
description:
DISCLAIMER: This project was made for the Wowie Jam 3 (https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-3)


-Resume-

Find a way out of the temple and overcome challenges over multiple generations!
Will you overcome the challenges of the jungle temple?


-Description-

Temple Generations is a game about exploring paths beyond a single life. Overcome enemies by setting the stage and ensure victory for the next to come.

The theme of the jam is "Failure is Progress" -> Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.
Temple Generations follows this rule by giving you challenges you can not overcome.
However, you will quickly find a new way to progress.
